name: caterwauling
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a high unpleasant noise like a cat, made by a person or animal: I heard some dreadful caterwauling - was that you singing? A heart-rending caterwauling came from outside. See
caterwaul
More examplesFewer examplesThe song was nothing but caterwauling. I closed all the windows to shut out the caterwauling of the cats outside.Her caterwauling was met with a storm of protest.
